languages.text: Также, немного заговорщицки, Паломник рассказывает историю о противостоянии двух ксеноских флотов, которую ему поведал... знакомый. К сожалению, он погиб от рук Инквизиции прежде, чем смог передать координаты крушения одного из ксеноских кораблей, однако Паломнику доподлинно известно, что судно сгинуло на одном из океанических миров.

traits.locale_text: Также, немного заговорщицки, Паломник рассказывает историю о противостоянии двух ксеноских флотов, которую ему поведал... знакомый. К сожалению, он погиб от рук Инквизиции прежде, чем смог передать координаты крушения одного из ксеноских кораблей, однако Паломнику доподлинно известно, что судно потонула на одном из океанических миров.

languages.text: Then, in a somewhat conspiratorial tone, the Pilgrim relates a story about a standoff between two xenos fleets, which he was told by... an acquaintance. The person in question, sadly enough, died at the hands of the Inquisition before they were able to pass on the coordinates for the crash site of one of the xenos ships. However, the Pilgrim knows for a fact that the vessel met its demise on an ocean world.
languages.original_text: Также, немного заговорщицки, Паломник рассказывает историю о противостоянии двух ксеноских флотов, которую ему поведал... знакомый. К сожалению, он погиб от рук Инквизиции прежде, чем смог передать координаты крушения одного из ксеноских кораблей, однако Паломнику доподлинно известно, что судно сгинуло на одном из океанических миров.

traits.locale_text: Then, in somewhat of a conspiratorial tone, the Pilgrim relates a story about a standoff between two xenos fleets, which he was told by... an acquaintance. Who, sadly enough, died at the hands of the Inquisition before they were able to pass the coordinates for the crash site of one of the xenos ships. However, The Pilgrim knows for a fact that the vessel had met its demise on an oceanworld.

The person in question, sadly enough, died at the hands of the Inquisition before they were able to pass on the coordinates for the crash site of one of the xenos ships. However, the Pilgrim knows for a fact that the vessel met its demise on an ocean world.

The person in question, sadly enough, died at the hands of the Inquisition before they were able to pass on the coordinates for the crash site of one of the xenos ships. However, the Pilgrim knows for a fact that the vessel met its demise on an ocean world.

languages.text: 随后，朝圣者带着似乎有些阴谋论的口吻，讲述了两支异形舰队彼此对峙的故事。他说，这个故事是他的……某个熟人告诉他的。遗憾的是，这个人还没来得及发送其中一艘坠毁的异形飞船的坐标，就被审判庭的人处决了。不过，朝圣者知道一件确切的事情：那艘飞船是在某个海洋世界中坠毁的。
languages.original_text: Then, in a somewhat conspiratorial tone, the Pilgrim relates a story about a standoff between two xenos fleets, which he was told by... an acquaintance. The person in question, sadly enough, died at the hands of the Inquisition before they were able to pass on the coordinates for the crash site of one of the xenos ships. However, the Pilgrim knows for a fact that the vessel met its demise on an ocean world.

traits.locale_text: 随后，朝圣者带着似乎有些阴谋论的口吻，讲述了两支异形舰队彼此对峙的故事。他说，这个故事是他的……某个熟人告诉他的。遗憾的是，这个人还没来得及发送其中一艘坠毁的异形飞船的坐标，就被审判庭的人处决了。不过，朝圣者知道一件确切的事情：那艘飞船是在某个海洋世界中坠毁的。

languages.text: En tono conspirador, el Peregrino te cuenta la historia del enfrentamiento entre dos flotas xenos que escuchó de... un amigo. La persona en cuestión, lamentablemente, murió a manos de la Inquisición antes de poder contar a nadie las coordenadas del lugar del impacto de una de las naves xenos. Sin embargo, el Peregrino sabe que la nave acabó destruida en un mundo oceánico.
languages.original_text: Then, in a somewhat conspiratorial tone, the Pilgrim relates a story about a standoff between two xenos fleets, which he was told by... an acquaintance. The person in question, sadly enough, died at the hands of the Inquisition before they were able to pass on the coordinates for the crash site of one of the xenos ships. However, the Pilgrim knows for a fact that the vessel met its demise on an ocean world.

traits.locale_text: En tono conspirador, el Peregrino te cuenta la historia del enfrentamiento entre dos flotas xenos que escuchó de... un amigo. La persona en cuestión, lamentablemente, murió a manos de la Inquisición antes de poder contar a nadie las coordenadas del lugar del impacto de una de las naves xenos. Sin embargo, el Peregrino sabe que la nave acabó destruida en un mundo oceánico.

languages.text: そして、やや陰謀めいた口調で、巡礼者は知人から聞いた2つの異種族艦隊の睨み合いについての話をした。その人物は、悲しいかな、異端審問庁（インクィジション）の手によって、異種族（ゼノ）の船の墜落地点の座標を伝えることができないまま死んでしまった。しかし、巡礼者は、その船が海洋世界で墜落した事実を知っている。
languages.original_text: Then, in a somewhat conspiratorial tone, the Pilgrim relates a story about a standoff between two xenos fleets, which he was told by... an acquaintance. The person in question, sadly enough, died at the hands of the Inquisition before they were able to pass on the coordinates for the crash site of one of the xenos ships. However, the Pilgrim knows for a fact that the vessel met its demise on an ocean world.

traits.locale_text: そして、やや陰謀めいた口調で、巡礼者は知人から聞いた2つの異種族艦隊の睨み合いについての話をした。その人物は、悲しいかな、異端審問庁（インクィジション）の手によって、異種族（ゼノ）の船の墜落地点の座標を伝えることができないまま死んでしまった。しかし、巡礼者は、その船が海洋世界で墜落した事実を知っている。

languages.text: Dann erzählt der Pilger in leicht verschwörerischem Ton die Geschichte von einer Pattsituation zwischen zwei Xenos-Flotten, die ihm ... ein Bekannter erzählt hat. Dieser Bekannter ist leider durch die Hände der Inquisition ums Leben gekommen, ehe er die Koordinaten weitergeben konnte, an denen eines der Xenos-Schiffe abgestürzt ist. Der Pilger weiß jedoch, dass die letzte Ruhestätte des Schiffs auf einer Ozeanwelt liegt.
languages.original_text: Then, in a somewhat conspiratorial tone, the Pilgrim relates a story about a standoff between two xenos fleets, which he was told by... an acquaintance. The person in question, sadly enough, died at the hands of the Inquisition before they were able to pass on the coordinates for the crash site of one of the xenos ships. However, the Pilgrim knows for a fact that the vessel met its demise on an ocean world.

traits.locale_text: Dann erzählt der Pilger in leicht verschwörerischem Ton die Geschichte von einer Pattsituation zwischen zwei Xenos-Flotten, die ihm ... ein Bekannter erzählt hat. Dieser Bekannter ist leider durch die Hände der Inquisition ums Leben gekommen, ehe er die Koordinaten weitergeben konnte, an denen eines der Xenos-Schiffe abgestürzt ist. Der Pilger weiß jedoch, dass die letzte Ruhestätte des Schiffs auf einer Ozeanwelt liegt.

languages.text: Puis, d'une voix complice, le Pèlerin vous fait part d'une confrontation entre deux flottes xénos dont il a eu vent par... une connaissance. Coup du sort, l'individu en question est mort des mains de l'Inquisition avant d'avoir pu transmettre les coordonnées du crash de l'un des vaisseaux xénos. Cependant, le Pèlerin sait avec certitude que le vaisseau a sombré dans un monde océanique.
languages.original_text: Then, in a somewhat conspiratorial tone, the Pilgrim relates a story about a standoff between two xenos fleets, which he was told by... an acquaintance. The person in question, sadly enough, died at the hands of the Inquisition before they were able to pass on the coordinates for the crash site of one of the xenos ships. However, the Pilgrim knows for a fact that the vessel met its demise on an ocean world.

traits.locale_text: Puis, d'une voix complice, le Pèlerin vous fait part d'une confrontation entre deux flottes xénos dont il a eu vent par... une connaissance. Coup du sort, l'individu en question est mort des mains de l'Inquisition avant d'avoir pu transmettre les coordonnées du crash de l'un des vaisseaux xénos. Cependant, le Pèlerin sait avec certitude que le vaisseau a sombré dans un monde océanique.

languages.text: Sonrasında Hacı, gizemli bir tonla iki zeno filosu arasındaki bir hesaplaşmaya dair bir hikâye anlatıyor. Hikâyeyi duyduğu kişi... Bir tanıdığıymış. Ne yazık ki bu şahıs, zeno gemilerinden birinin enkazının koordinatlarını iletemeden Engizisyon'un ellerinde hayatını kaybetmiş. Ancak Hacı, geminin bir okyanus dünyasında olduğundan emin olduğunu söylüyor.
languages.original_text: Then, in a somewhat conspiratorial tone, the Pilgrim relates a story about a standoff between two xenos fleets, which he was told by... an acquaintance. The person in question, sadly enough, died at the hands of the Inquisition before they were able to pass on the coordinates for the crash site of one of the xenos ships. However, the Pilgrim knows for a fact that the vessel met its demise on an ocean world.
